data.title: Films about chickens
data.text:
1.

Surf's Up

2007 American film

Overview: Surf's Up is a 2007 American computer-animated mockumentary comedy film directed by Ash Brannon and Chris Buck. It features the voices of Shia LaBeouf, Jeff Bridges, Zooey Deschanel, Jon Heder, Mario ...

Release date: 2 June 2007

Genre: Animation, Comedy, Family, Sport

A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

0 0

2.

Chicken Run

2000 stop-motion animated comedy film

Overview: Chicken Run is a 2000 stop motion animated adventure comedy film produced by the British studio Aardman Animations in partnership with American studio DreamWorks Animation, and French studio Pathé. The ...

Release date: 21 June 2000

Genre: Animation, Family, Comedy, Adventure, Drama

When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

0 0

3.

Chicken Little

2005 Disney animated film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation

Overview: Chicken Little is a 2005 American 3D computer-animated science fiction comedy film, produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and loosely based on the original fable of the same name. The 46th Disney ...

Release date: 30 October 2005

Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi

Director: Mark Dindal

After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

0 0

4.

Conference of Animals

2010 film

Overview: Animals United (German: Konferenz der Tiere) is a 2010 German 3D computer animated comedy adventure film directed and produced by Reinhard Klooss and Holger Tappe. It was released on 7 October 2010 in ...

Release date: 7 October 2010

Genre: Animation, Family, Comedy

A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have ...

0 0

5.

The Three Caballeros

1944 American animated musical film produced by Walt Disney Productions

Overview: The Three Caballeros is a 1944 American live-action animated musical package film produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures. The film premiered in Mexico City on December 21, 1944. It ...

Release date: 21 December 1944

Genre: Animation, Family, Fantasy, Music

Producer: Walt Disney

Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican ...

0 0

6.

The Egg and I

1947 film by Chester Erskine

Overview: The Egg and I is a 1947 American romantic comedy film directed by Chester Erskine, who co-wrote the screenplay with Fred F. Finklehoffe, based on the book of the same name by Betty MacDonald and starring ...

Release date: 21 March 1947

Genre: Comedy, Romance

Director: Chester Erskine

On their wedding night, Bob reveals to Betty that he has purchased an abandoned chicken farm. Betty struggles to adapt to their new rural lifestyle, e ...

0 0

9.

Una película de huevos

2006 Mexican film

Overview: Una Película de Huevos (Spanish for A Movie of Eggs) is a 2006 Mexican animated adventure comedy film produced by Huevocartoon Producciones, and features voices of Bruno Bichir, Angélica Vale and Carlos ...

Release date: 21 April 2006

Genre: Comedy, Family, Animation

A small egg named Toto decides that he doesn't want to become the breakfast and starts an adventure to become a chicken.

0 0

10.

Un rescate de huevitos

2021 Mexican film

Overview: Un rescate de huevitos (released internationally as Little Eggs: An African Rescue; formerly Huevitos en fuga) is a Mexican animated film produced by Huevocartoon Producciones.

Toto and his friends must rescue his egg children after they're taken away for a gourmet food event in Africa.

0 0

11.

Peter Rabbit

2018 film by Will Gluck

Overview: Peter Rabbit is an upcoming live-action/computer-animated film directed by Will Gluck. It is based on the book The Tale of Peter Rabbit by Beatrix Potter. Produced by Sony Pictures Animation, in colla ...

Release date: 23 March 2018

Genre: Family, Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy

Director: Will Gluck

A rebellious rabbit tries to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

0 0

12.

Huevos: Little Rooster's Egg-cellent Adventure

2015 Mexican film

Overview: Un gallo con muchos huevos (Spanish: A Rooster with Many Eggs), released in the United States as Huevos: Little Rooster's Egg-cellent Adventure, is a 3D Mexican computer animated film produced by Huev ...

Genre: Animation

Toto, a young chick born the run of the litter, rises to the occasion when a rancher threatens his home and his family.

0 0

13.

Another Egg and Chicken Movie

2009 Mexican film

Overview: Otra Película de Huevos y un Pollo (Spanish for Another Movie about Eggs and a Chick) is a Mexican animated adventure comedy film produced by a Mexican animation studio Huevocartoon Producciones, and a ...

Tweety's High-Flying Adventure

2000 animated film

Overview: Tweety's High-Flying Adventure is a 2000 direct-to-video animated musical comedy film produced by Tom Minton and James T. Walker, written by Tom Minton, Tim Cahill and Julie McNally, and directed by James ...

Release date: 12 September 2000

A full-length animated feature starring the little yellow bird. When Col. Rimfire announces at the Looney...

15.

Wedding Trough

1974 Belgian exploitation horror film by Thierry Zéno

Overview: Vase de Noces (also known as Wedding Trough and The Pig Fucking Movie) a 1974 Belgian avant-garde art exploitation film directed by Thierry Zéno and starring Dominique Garny.

Release date: 11 April 1975

Genre: Romance, Horror

Director: Thierry Zéno

Cast: Dominique Garny

A mad farmer falls in love with his pig and has mutant piglets with it. When the "piglets" prefer their mother over him, he hangs them all and ...

Consumed

2015 American film

Genre: Drama, Thriller

Director: Daryl Wein

When her son's persistent rash won't subside, a mother begins investigating and finds herself pulled into the battle between small town organic farmers ...

19.

Overview: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana is a 2012 Indian comedy film produced by Ronnie Screwvala, Siddharth Roy Kapur and Anurag Kashyap and directed by debutante Sameer Sharma.

Genre: Comedy
